armor

item id [id]: 416
armor id [armor]: 200 (Champion's Cuirass)
protection, body [protbody]: 18
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 3
regeneration [regeneration]: 5%
awe [awe]: +1
mustfightinarena [mustfightinarena]: 1
arenareward [arenareward]: 1
(unremovable [cursed], quickness [quick], lucky [luck], won't-be-picked-up [nofind])

Item cannot be forged.

The winner of the arena death match may receive this armor. The Champion will have to defend this prize in upcoming death matches until it finally passes along to a new Champion.
